faq.question: How long does it take to summarize a 500-page PDF?
faq.answer: Typically 1-3 minutes depending on the document complexity. Our AI processes documents incredibly fast regardless of length.

faq.question: Is there a page limit?
faq.answer: No! Free users can summarize PDFs up to 50 pages. Paid plans support unlimited pages, including 500+ page documents.

faq.question: Will I miss important details?
faq.answer: No. Our AI is trained to identify all key information, arguments, conclusions, and critical details. You can also ask questions about specific sections.

faq.question: Can I get summaries of specific sections?
faq.answer: Yes! After the initial summary, you can ask questions like 'Summarize Chapter 5' or 'What does the conclusion say?' to get targeted summaries.

faq.question: What types of long documents work best?
faq.answer: All types! Research papers, legal contracts, technical manuals, business reports, ebooks, dissertations, and more.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Free plan includes 5 summaries/month (up to 50 pages). Starter ($9/mo) includes 50 summaries with unlimited pages. See all plans.
